Key Arguments: The bill will cause division and is undemocratic.
The government should trust the public to discern fact from fiction.
An informed and discerning public is preferable to government control over information.
No one, especially unelected bureaucrats, can be the sole source of truth.
Notable Quotes: The proposed ‘Misinformation Bill’ is a disaster.
Such an ‘us and them’ mentality is undemocratic and will prove devastating for our country.
This bill has shades of Hitler all over it.
